subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta’s largely African-American fan base that embraced Michael Vick for his eye-pleasing, heart-pounding style of play has warmed to Matt Ryan, who has the Falcons at 7-4.
snippet: The Atlanta’s largely African-American fan base that embraced Michael Vick for his eye-pleasing, heart-pounding style of play has warmed to Matt Ryan, who has the Falcons at 7-4.
